topics.body:
Well I've finished Bayo1. Again.
And I think one of the MANY reasons why it's my favorite game is because there's just so much _game_ in it.

topics.body: I'm planning on getting Bayonetta 2.
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54503fa4636872222b080200#post_54503fa4636872222b080200
They removed the penalty for using items and I think they toned down how much magic you lose when getting hit. Plus the combat moves the slightest bit smoother than the original. 

I was getting all stones in bayo 1 and I don't think I even know what a stone looks like in 2. 
As much as I'm liking my lollipops, I hope the penalty is back in the higher difficulties. 



"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5450400263687219cd070100#post_5450400263687219cd070100
I was link. Because I didn't want to pay up the halos for the parrying item.
